name: DataBreach
description: A case template for handling data breach incidents
author: DFIR-IRIS
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a data breach

tasks.title: Identify compromised data
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the breach by identifying affected data and systems

tasks.title: Contain the breach
tasks.description: Secure compromised systems and prevent further unauthorized access

tasks.title: Investigate the breach
tasks.description: Perform a thorough investigation to determine the root cause of the breach

tasks.title: Notify affected parties
tasks.description: Notify affected individuals and relevant authorities about the breach

tasks.title: Implement security improvements
tasks.description: Implement and update security measures to prevent future breaches

notes.title: Compromised data
notes.content: Details of the data compromised in the breach

notes.title: Root cause
notes.content: Summary of the root cause of the data breach
